name: Opera Nova
description: Opera Nova is a musical journey for Virtual Reality inspired by Disney's Fantasia, in which you explore 3d sound sculptures. Opera Nova immerses the user in a fantastic world of 3D color and sound. This demo also uses a binaural spatialization plugin to give the sounds an extra element of realism. - Supports Oculus Rift DK1 & DK2. - Nominated for the Proto Award for Best Original Score
